content: everyone needs at least one of these adorable gnomes this christmas fill with their favorite treat candy granola cookie mix preserves customize to your hearts desire materials you ll need craft value yarn in white red and peach 5mm crochet hook 5mm crochet hook darning needle scissors either half-pint or pint mason jars gauge 8sts and 9 row in 2 sizes this pattern is for half-pint and pint-sized mason jars the 4 5mm hook is used to make half-pint size and the 5mm hook is used to make the larger pint size gnome notes always start the first stitch of the round in the same st as the chain this pattern is written in us terms
